# **Introduction**
This document contains quality check (QC) results from running **MAGeCK-VISPR** _test_ module on immune-related CRISPR data. We have annotated the results into four major categories: **Coculture screenings**, **Essentiality screenings**, **In-vivo screenings**, and **Sorting screenings**.
